data.what_is: Exposebox is an AI-powered platform, designed to create personalized customer journeys, drive engagement, and boost revenue. Use Exposebox to take your marketing to the next level. Our AI-based insights and machine learning allow us to personalize every user touchpoint, from product recommendations to emails, SMS and social media. Join us to better leverage your customer data and optimize marketing segmentation. Your customers are unique; use Exposebox to keep them engaged.
data.product_description: We are committed to helping businesses personalise their entire customer lifecycle and get to know their customer's behaviour in-depth, through detailed analytics. To date, we have personalised millions of web pages and worked with businesses of all sizes from SMB's all the way to Enterprise corporations. All of our clients have seen a rapid increase in performance and ROI across all their marketing channels. We design with the philosophy that simplicity is best. ExposeBox is super quick to on-board, easy to use, and will help you streamline your marketing processes, allowing you to better target your customers and deliver more effective campaigns.
